info.title: Bluesky Social
info.description: Specification for the Bluesky Social endpoints

scopes.transition:generic: General access to user data and actions
scopes.transition:chat.bsky: Access to chat features, including direct messages

get.description: Retrieves a list of posts liked by a specific actor (user) within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose likes are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of liked posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of posts liked by the specified actor.

postId.description: The unique identifier of the liked post.

likedAt.description: The timestamp when the post was liked.

content.description: The content of the liked post.

text.description: The text content of the post.

type.description: The type of media (e.g., image, video).

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified actor does not exist or has no liked posts.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves the preferences for a specific actor (user) within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.actor` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose preferences are being retrieved.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the preferences for the specified actor.

preferences.description: An object containing various preferences for the actor.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified actor does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Uploads a video to the Bluesky network for processing and sharing. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.video` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The video file to be uploaded.

200.description: Successfully uploaded the video.

jobId.description: The unique identifier of the video processing job.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves the upload limits for videos within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.video` namespace and requires authentication.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the video upload limits.

maxSizeInBytes.description: The maximum file size allowed for video uploads, in bytes.

allowedFormats.description: A list of allowed video formats (e.g., MP4, AVI).

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves the status of a specific video processing job within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.video` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the video processing job.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the status of the video processing job.

jobId.description: The unique identifier of the job.

status.description: The current status of the job.

errorMessage.description: An error message if the job failed.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves the count of unread notifications for the authenticated user within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.notification` namespace and requires authentication.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the unread notification count.

unreadCount.description: The total number of unread notifications.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of labeler services available within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.labeler` namespace and does not require authentication.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of labeler services.

serviceId.description: The unique identifier of the labeler service.

name.description: The name of the labeler service.

description.description: A brief description of the labeler service.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Mutes a specific thread within the Bluesky network, preventing its content from appearing in the authenticated user's feed. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: body

threadId.description: The unique identifier of the thread to mute.

parameters.description: Details of the thread to mute.

200.description: Successfully muted the specified thread.

success.description: Indicates if the thread was successfully muted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of starter packs within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of starter packs to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of starter packs.

packId.description: The unique identifier of the starter pack.

name.description: The name of the starter pack.

description.description: A brief description of the starter pack.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific starter pack within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: packId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the starter pack to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved details of the specified starter pack.

packId.description: The unique identifier of the starter pack.

name.description: The name of the starter pack.

description.description: A brief description of the starter pack.

userId.description: The unique identifier of a member in the starter pack.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of mutual followers or users following both the authenticated user and a specified actor within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose known followers are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of mutual followers to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of mutual followers for the specified actor.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the mutual follower.

followedAt.description: The timestamp when the mutual following occurred.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves the profile information for a specific actor (user) within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.actor` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose profile is being retrieved.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the profile information for the specified actor.

profile.description: An object containing profile details for the actor.

displayName.description: The display name of the actor.

bio.description: The bio or description of the actor.

website.description: The website URL associated with the actor.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the actor's avatar image.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified actor does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of starter packs for a specific actor, which can include suggested connections or groups within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor for whom starter packs are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of starter packs to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of starter packs for the specified actor.

packId.description: The unique identifier of the starter pack.

name.description: The name of the starter pack.

description.description: A brief description of the starter pack.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the starter pack was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves profile information for multiple actors within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.actor` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorIds
parameters.description: A list of unique identifiers for the actors whose profiles are being retrieved.

200.description: Successfully retrieved profile information for the specified actors.

profile.description: An object containing profile details for each actor.

actorId.description: The unique identifier of the actor.

displayName.description: The display name of the actor.

bio.description: The bio or description of the actor.

website.description: The website URL associated with the actor.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the actor's avatar image.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - One or more of the specified actors do not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Sends user interactions, such as likes or reposts, for a specified post within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: interactions

postId.description: The unique identifier of the post being interacted with.

interactionType.description: The type of interaction being performed.

parameters.description: An array of interactions to be sent.

200.description: Successfully recorded the interactions.

message.description: Confirmation message for the successful operation.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of posts quoting a specific post within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the post being quoted.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of quotes to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of quotes for the specified post.

postId.description: The unique identifier of the quoting post.

authorId.description: The unique identifier of the author of the quoting post.

content.description: The content of the quoting post.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of suggested actors (users) within the Bluesky network based on the current user's profile and interests. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.actor` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of suggested actors to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved a list of suggested actors.

actorId.description: The unique identifier of the suggested actor.

displayName.description: The display name of the suggested actor.

bio.description: The bio or description of the suggested actor.

location.description: The location of the suggested actor.

website.description: The website URL associated with the suggested actor.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the suggested actor's avatar image.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

put.description: Updates the notification preferences for the authenticated user within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.notification` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: body

preferences.description: An object containing the notification preferences to update.

parameters.description: The updated notification preferences.

200.description: Successfully updated the notification preferences.

success.description: Indicates whether the preferences were successfully updated.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves the skeleton structure of a feed for a specific generator within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: generatorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the feed generator.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to retrieve in the skeleton feed.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the feed skeleton for the specified generator.

itemId.description: The unique identifier of the item in the skeleton feed.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Registers a device for receiving push notifications within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.notification` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: body

deviceToken.description: The token of the device being registered for push notifications.

parameters.description: Details of the device being registered.

200.description: Successfully registered the device for push notifications.

success.description: Indicates whether the device was successfully registered.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Searches for actors (users) within the Bluesky network based on a search query. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.actor` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query to find actors.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of search results to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved search results for actors matching the query.

actorId.description: The unique identifier of the actor.

displayName.description: The display name of the actor.

bio.description: The bio or description of the actor.

website.description: The website URL associated with the actor.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the actor's avatar image.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Provides typeahead suggestions for actors (users) within the Bluesky network based on a partial search query. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.actor` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The partial search query to find actors.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of typeahead suggestions to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved typeahead suggestions for actors matching the query.

actorId.description: The unique identifier of the suggested actor.

displayName.description: The display name of the suggested actor.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the suggested actor's avatar image.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of users who reposted a specific post within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the post being reposted.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of reposts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of users who reposted the specified post.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who reposted.

repostedAt.description: The timestamp when the post was reposted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves the relationship status between the authenticated actor and specified users within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: userIds
parameters.description: A list of user IDs to retrieve relationship status for.

200.description: Successfully retrieved relationship statuses for the specified users.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user.

relationshipStatus.description: The relationship status between the authenticated actor and the user.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of suggested follows based on a specific actor within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose suggested follows are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of suggested follows to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of suggested follows for the specified actor.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the suggested user to follow.

reason.description: The reason why this user was suggested as a follow.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of suggested feeds for the user based on their activity and interests within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of suggested feeds to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of suggested feeds for the user.

feedId.description: The unique identifier of the suggested feed.

name.description: The name of the suggested feed.

description.description: A brief description of the suggested feed.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the feed was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of feeds created or associated with a specific actor (user) within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose feeds are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of feeds to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of feeds associated with the specified actor.

feedId.description: The unique identifier of the feed.

description.description: A brief description of the feed.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the feed was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified actor does not exist or has no associated feeds.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves the feed of posts created by a specific author (user) within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: authorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the author whose feed is being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the feed of the specified author.

postId.description: The unique identifier of the post.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

text.description: The text content of the post.

type.description: The type of media (e.g., image, video).

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified author does not exist or has no posts.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves the main feed for a user, including posts from followed accounts and recommended content within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user whose main feed is being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of posts to retrieve in the feed.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the main feed for the specified user.

postId.description: The unique identifier of the post.

authorId.description: The unique identifier of the author of the post.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

text.description: The text content of the post.

type.description: The type of media (e.g., image, video).

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified user does not exist or has no feed.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves posts and related content from a specified feed generator within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: generatorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the feed generator.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the posts from the specified feed generator.

postId.description: The unique identifier of the post.

authorId.description: The unique identifier of the author of the post.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

text.description: The text content of the post.

type.description: The type of media (e.g., image, video).

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified feed generator does not exist or has no posts.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves metadata about multiple feed generators within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: generatorIds
parameters.description: A list of unique identifiers for the feed generators to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved metadata for the specified feed generators.

generatorId.description: The unique identifier of the feed generator.

name.description: The name of the feed generator.

description.description: A brief description of the feed generator.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves metadata and configuration details about a feed generator within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: generatorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the feed generator.

200.description: Successfully retrieved metadata and configuration details for the feed generator.

generatorId.description: The unique identifier of the feed generator.

name.description: The name of the feed generator.

description.description: A description of the feed generator.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the feed generator was created.

config.description: Configuration details for the feed generator.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified feed generator does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of users who liked a specific post within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the post whose likes are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of likes to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of users who liked the specified post.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who liked the post.

likedAt.description: The timestamp when the post was liked.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a thread of posts starting from a specific post within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the starting post in the thread.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: The depth of the thread to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the post thread starting from the specified post.

postId.description: The unique identifier of a post in the thread.

authorId.description: The unique identifier of the post's author.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves multiple posts by their unique identifiers within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: postIds
parameters.description: A list of unique identifiers for the posts to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the specified posts.

postId.description: The unique identifier of the post.

authorId.description: The unique identifier of the post's author.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.summary: Retrieve users who reposted a post
get.description: Fetches a list of users who have reposted a specified post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the post for which repost information is being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of reposts to retrieve.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: A timestamp to paginate results, retrieving reposts before this time.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The order in which to sort the reposts, e.g., by time.

200.description: A list of users who reposted the specified post.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who reposted the post.

displayName.description: The display name of the user who reposted the post.

repostedAt.description: The timestamp when the user reposted the post.

get.description: Retrieves the user's timeline, including posts from followed accounts and relevant content within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the user's timeline.

postId.description: The unique identifier of the post.

authorId.description: The unique identifier of the post's author.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Allows the authenticated user to follow a specified user on the platform.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user to follow.

200.description: Confirmation that the user was successfully followed.

success.description: Indicates whether the follow action was successful.

message.description: A message confirming that the user was followed.

get.description: Retrieves a list of blocks associated with a specific list within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the list whose blocks are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of blocks to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the blocks for the specified list.

userId.description: The unique identifier of a blocked user.

blockedAt.description: The timestamp when the user was blocked.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of users blocked by the authenticated actor within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of blocked users to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of blocked users.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the blocked user.

blockedAt.description: The timestamp when the user was blocked.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of users following a specified actor within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose followers are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of followers to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of followers for the specified actor.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the follower.

followedAt.description: The timestamp when the actor was followed.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of users that a specified actor is following. This endpoint is part of the Bluesky application Lexicon APIs (`app.bsky.*`) and typically requires authentication. For further details, see the  [API Hosts and Auth guide](https://docs.bsky.app/docs/advanced-guides/api-directory).

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The DID or handle of the actor whose follows are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of follows to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results, provided by the previous response.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of follows for the specified actor.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next set of results, if available.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

message.description: Detailed error message for unauthorized access.

get.description: Retrieves details about a specific list created by an actor within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the list to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved details for the specified list.

listId.description: The unique identifier of the list.

description.description: A brief description of the list.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the list was created.

userId.description: The unique identifier of a user in the list.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of mutes associated with a specific list within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the list whose mutes are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of mutes to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the mutes for the specified list.

userId.description: The unique identifier of a muted user.

mutedAt.description: The timestamp when the user was muted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a feed for a specific list of users within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the list whose feed is being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the feed for the specified list.

postId.description: The unique identifier of the post.

authorId.description: The unique identifier of the post's author.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves all lists created by a specific actor within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose lists are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of lists to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the lists for the specified actor.

listId.description: The unique identifier of the list.

description.description: A brief description of the list.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the list was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of users muted by the authenticated actor within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of muted users to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of muted users.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the muted user.

mutedAt.description: The timestamp when the user was muted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Searches for posts across the Bluesky network based on a specified query. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.feed` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query to find posts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of search results to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved search results for posts matching the query.

postId.description: The unique identifier of the post.

authorId.description: The unique identifier of the post's author.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Mutes a specific actor (user) within the Bluesky network, preventing their content from appearing in the authenticated user's feed. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: body

actorId.description: The unique identifier of the actor to mute.

parameters.description: Details of the actor to mute.

200.description: Successfully muted the specified actor.

success.description: Indicates if the actor was successfully muted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Mutes a specific list of actors (users) within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: body

listId.description: The unique identifier of the list to mute.

parameters.description: Details of the list to mute.

200.description: Successfully muted the specified list of actors.

success.description: Indicates if the list was successfully muted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Unmutes a specific thread within the Bluesky network, allowing its content to reappear in the authenticated user's feed. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: body

threadId.description: The unique identifier of the thread to unmute.

parameters.description: Details of the thread to unmute.

200.description: Successfully unmuted the specified thread.

success.description: Indicates if the thread was successfully unmuted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Unmutes a specific actor (user) within the Bluesky network, allowing their content to reappear in the authenticated user's feed. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

actorId.description: The unique identifier of the actor to unmute.

parameters.description: Details of the actor to unmute.

200.description: Successfully unmuted the specified actor.

post.description: Unmutes a specific list of actors (users) within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.graph` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: body

listId.description: The unique identifier of the list to unmute.

parameters.description: Details of the list to unmute.

200.description: Successfully unmuted the specified list of actors.

get.description: Retrieves a list of notifications for the authenticated user within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.notification` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of notifications to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of notifications.

notificationId.description: The unique identifier of the notification.

type.description: The type of notification (e.g., like, follow, comment).

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the notification was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Marks specific notifications as seen for the authenticated user within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `app.bsky.notification` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: body

notificationIds.description: A list of notification IDs to mark as seen.

parameters.description: Details of the notifications being marked as seen.

200.description: Successfully updated the seen status for the specified notifications.

success.description: Indicates whether the notifications were successfully marked as seen.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

delete.description: Permanently deletes an actor's account and all associated data within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky.actor` namespace and requires authentication.

200.description: Successfully deleted the account.

success.description: Indicates whether the account was successfully deleted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Exports all data associated with an actor's account within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky.actor` namespace and requires authentication.

200.description: Successfully exported the account data.

data.description: The exported account data, typically in JSON format.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

delete.description: Deletes a message from a conversation for the authenticated actor only. The message remains visible to other participants. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky.convo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the message to delete.

200.description: Successfully deleted the message for the authenticated actor.

success.description: Indicates whether the message was successfully deleted for the actor.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific conversation, including participants and metadata, within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky.convo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the conversation to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the conversation details.

convoId.description: The unique identifier of the conversation.

userId.description: The unique identifier of a participant in the conversation.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves details of a conversation shared between specific members within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky.convo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.description: The list of user IDs participating in the conversation.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the conversation details for the specified members.

convoId.description: The unique identifier of the conversation.

userId.description: The unique identifier of a participant in the conversation.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves the log of a specific conversation, including all messages exchanged, within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky.convo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the conversation whose log is being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of messages to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the conversation log.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the message.

senderId.description: The unique identifier of the message sender.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the message.

senderId.description: The unique identifier of the message sender.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Allows the authenticated user to leave a specific conversation within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky.convo` namespace and requires authentication.

convoId.description: The unique identifier of the conversation to leave.

200.description: Successfully left the conversation.

success.description: Indicates whether the user successfully left the conversation.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results.

convoId.description: The unique identifier of the conversation.

lastMessage.description: Details of the last message in the conversation.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the last message.

post.description: Mutes a specific conversation for the authenticated user within the Bluesky network. This prevents notifications for the conversation. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky.convo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.description: Details of the conversation to mute.

convoId.description: The unique identifier of the conversation to send a message to.

content.description: The content of the message to send.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the sent message.

post.description: Marks a conversation as read up to a specific message for the authenticated user within the Bluesky network. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky.convo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.description: The number of surrounding messages to retrieve.

success.description: Indicates whether the actor's access level was successfully updated.

get.description: Fetches a list of popular posts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of popular posts to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Used to fetch the next page of popular posts.

parameters.name: algorithm
parameters.description: Specifies the algorithm used to determine popularity.

200.description: Successful operation

500.description: Unexpected error

post.description: Authenticates to Bluesky and retrieves session tokens

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type header value

error.description: Type of error encountered during the request.

code.description: Optional error code, such as an HTTP status code.

details.description: Additional information about the error for debugging purposes.

serviceId.description: Unique identifier for the labeler service.

description.description: Brief description of the labeler service.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the service was created.

actor.description: The DID or handle of the target actor.

follows.description: Whether the primary actor follows the target actor.

blocks.description: Whether the primary actor has blocked the target actor.

muted.description: Whether the primary actor has muted the target actor.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user.

bio.description: Short biography or description of the user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user joined the network.

packId.description: Unique identifier of the starter pack.

description.description: Brief description of the starter pack.

userId.description: The unique identifier of a user in the starter pack.

bio.description: Short biography or description of the user.

uri.description: The URI for the suggested feed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the feed was created.
Timestamp indicating when the quote was created.
Timestamp of when the notification was created.

ProfileViewBasic.description: Basic profile view for a record's author.

handle.description: User handle or username for the profile.

displayName.description: The display name of the profile.

avatar.description: URL of the avatar image for the profile.

handle.description: User handle or username for the profile.

displayName.description: The display name of the profile.

description.description: A detailed description of the profile.

avatar.description: URL of the avatar image for the profile.

indexedAt.description: The timestamp when the profile was last indexed.

handle.description: User handle or username for the profile.

displayName.description: The display name of the profile.

description.description: A detailed description of the profile.

avatar.description: URL of the avatar image for the profile.

banner.description: URL of the banner image for the profile.

followersCount.description: The number of followers for the profile.

followsCount.description: The number of profiles followed by this profile.

postsCount.description: The total number of posts made by this profile.

indexedAt.description: The timestamp when the profile was last indexed.

ViewerState.description: Represents the viewer's state in relation to the profile.

muted.description: Indicates whether the viewer has muted the profile.

blockedBy.description: Indicates whether the viewer is blocked by the profile.

blocking.description: URI of the profile that the viewer is blocking.

following.description: URI of the profile that the viewer is following.

followedBy.description: URI of the profile that follows the viewer.

enabled.description: Indicates if adult content is enabled.

level.description: The level of adult content preference.

enabled.description: Indicates if adult content is enabled.

level.description: The level of adult content preference.

Label.description: Metadata tag on an atproto resource (e.g., repo or record).

src.description: DID of the actor who created this label.

uri.description: AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource to which this label applies.

cid.description: Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of the 'uri' resource to which this label applies.

val.description: The short string name of the value or type of this label.

neg.description: If true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label.

cts.description: Timestamp when this label was created.

ListViewBasic.description: Represents a basic view of a list, used for muted profiles.

embeds.description: Embedded views related to the record.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the record was indexed.

record.description: Embedded view of the record, including metadata and labels.

cid.description: CID (Content Identifier) specifying the version of the record.

embeds.description: Embedded views related to the record.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the record was indexed.

media.description: Embedded media associated with the record.
Media content embedded within the record.

record.description: The record content of the post.

embed.description: Embedded media associated with the post.

replyCount.description: Number of replies to the post.

repostCount.description: Number of times the post was reposted.

likeCount.description: Number of likes the post received.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the post was indexed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the post was created.

Embed.description: Embed object combining record and images.

TextSlice.description: Deprecated. Use app.bsky.richtext instead -- A text segment. Start is inclusive, end is exclusive. Indices are for utf16-encoded strings

subject.description: Decentralized Identifier (DID) of the resource being blocked.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the block action was created.

subject.description: Decentralized Identifier (DID) of the resource being followed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the follow action was created.

avatar.description: A binary file with a maximum size of 1,000,000 bytes. Accepts image/png or image/jpeg file types

createdAt.description: Creation date of the list item
Timestamp indicating when the feed was created.

did.description: Decentralized identifier (DID) of the feed generator.

displayName.description: Display name of the feed generator.

description.description: Detailed description of the feed generator.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the feed generator was created.

policies.description: Policies associated with the feed generator.

content.description: Content policy for the feed generator.

moderation.description: Moderation policy for the feed generator.

did.description: Decentralized Identifier (DID) of the mentioned actor.

items.description: A facet feature for actor mentions.

features.description: An array of mention features within the facet.

Mention.description: A facet feature for actor mentions.

did.description: Decentralized Identifier (DID) of the mentioned actor.

ByteSlice.description: A text segment. Start is inclusive, end is exclusive. Indices are for UTF-8 encoded strings.

byteStart.description: The starting index of the byte slice (inclusive).

byteEnd.description: The ending index of the byte slice (exclusive).

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the action was indexed.

reason.description: The reason for the post appearing in the feed, such as a repost.

parent.description: The parent post in the thread.

replies.description: An array of replies to the current post in the thread.

ThreadViewPost.description: Represents a single post in a threaded conversation, including its parent and replies.

Modlist.description: A list of actors to apply an aggregate moderation action (mute/block) on

StrongRef.description: A URI with a content-hash fingerprint.

features.description: An array of features within the rich text facet.
